phrs.translation: 不锈钢焊条；不锈纲电焊支
[机]铂电极；铂丝电极；白金电极
被覆焊条；带焊皮焊条；涂药电焊条

sentences.sentence: Metals are opaque, so the other electrode must be transparent.
sentences.translation: 金属是不透明的，因此另一个电极必须是透明的。

sentences.sentence: Mr. Prance hopes that his invention will not merely be more comfortable than today's electrode-based detectors, but will also be able to do new things.
sentences.translation: Prance 先生希望他的发明不仅仅是比现代基于电极的探测器更舒适，而且还能做一些新的事情。

sentences.sentence: They flow across the wire to the second electrode, which acts as an electron sink.
sentences.translation: 它们沿着线到达充当一个电子穴的第二电极。
